channel.title: Electron on Andy Bulka
channel.description: Recent content in Electron on Andy Bulka

item.title: Libraries & Tools
item.description: Snippet Creator This extension helps to automate snippet creation. Select the code you want to create snippet from and use command Create Snippet from the command palette or your custom keybind. https://github.com/abulka/vscode-snippet-creator Snippets Explorer Visual Studio Code extension which displays all available language snippets in a TreeView https://github.com/abulka/vscode-snippets-explorer Electron-Flask App Generator Yoeman project generator to create an Electron app running a Flask server inside itself. Deployable via PyInstaller and Electron Forge packager.

item.title: Building a Python-Electron App
item.description: Building a normal, deployable application for Mac or Windows, using Python 3 is hard. There is nothing like Visual Studio or Delphi (remember that?) for Python where you can drag and drop to design a GUI, press a button and get an .exe or .app to give people. Sad. The closest you can get is to follow a long recipe of steps â€” which I propose to outline here. See full article on Medium here.
